page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: Farming Moulshay Farm is a tenant farm owned by the occupants of 'Redlands House'. It is mainly arable farming,growing maize, wheat, barley and corn.One field remaining fallow for the rotation of crops. Four Lanes Farm is very old and is no longer in use. It was owned by Lord Sherfield who sold most of the land for development. The farmhouse is a dry moat house. Crockfords Farm is mainly arable, but it also has a small herd of dairy cattle.Access to the farm is by means of a mud track. Basing Village has approximately 2400 acres of cultivated land.Wheat, barley and root crops are grown.
